name: MEGANE CLEANUP SERVICE
description:
Megane Cleanup Service is highly addictive and colorful, play at your own risks. Story 

Join the Megane Cleanup Service division and cleanse the evil from its root:  disorder! Clean the junk, get money, spend it on cool swag, repeat.

Controls [WASD]/[LEFT STICK]Move[LEFT CLICK]/[RIGHT TRIGGER] (HOLD)Vacuum[ESCAPE]/[START]Pause  Developer Note: 

We made this game in less than 48 hours from scratch, so it's pretty rough around the edges but we had fun so.....whatever! Everything was made during the jam including the music.

Join our discord and say hi!! :  https://discord.gg/ttJyGXTny4
